name: A Handsome Story
description:
A Handsome Story is a single-player platformer in which the player controls left hand.

Gameplay:
The goal is to collect 5 rings which will grant you access to the portal to the next level.

Controls:
[A] = Move Left
[D] = Move Right
[F] = Kick
[Spacebar] = Jump

Credits:
GGBot
Urukhai
Ignis - Music
